subProduct.des: Sauvage is an act of creation inspired by wide-open spaces. A composition signed with a raw freshness, between power and nobility.
des_content: The strong gust of Citrus in Sauvage Eau de Toilette is powerfully anchored by the ambery nobleness of Ambroxan, resinous Elemi and Woodsthat bind the whole.
Instantle recognisable, it has become a genuine signature scent, unique* in its confident virility.
Like a deep breath of fresh air, Sauvage Eau de Toilette is a bold composition for a man who is true to himself.
des_about_des: Sauvage Eau de Toilette 100ml & new 30ml are now refillable.
Dior Sauvage is a radically fresh composition, dictated by a name that has the ring of a manifesto. That was the way François Demachy, Dior Perfume-Creator, wanted it: raw and noble all at once.
Natural ingredients, selected with extreme care, prevail in excessive doses.
Radiant top notes burst with the juicy freshness of Reggio di Calabria Bergamot. Ambroxan, derived from precious ambergris, unleashes a powerfully woody trail.
Sauvage is an act of creation inspired by wide-open spaces. An ozone blue sky sprawled above a rocky landscape, white-hot beneath the desert sun.

subProduct.des: Sauvage is an act of creation inspired by wide-open spaces. A composition signed with a raw freshness, between power and nobility.
des_content: François Demachy, Dior Perfumer-Creator, drew inspiration from the desert in the magical hour of twilight. Mixed with the coolness of the night, the burning desert air exudes profound fragrances. In the hour when the wolves come out and the sky is set ablaze, a new magic unfolds.
des_about_des: The juicy and spicy freshness of Dior Sauvage exudes new sensual and enveloping facets of vanilla absolute.

The powerful freshness of Sauvage exudes new sensual and mysterious facets, amply renewing itself with the signature of an ingenious composition. Calabrian bergamot, as juicy and spirited as ever, invites new spicy notes to add fullness and sensuality, as the woody ambery trail of Ambroxan® is wrapped in the smoky accents of Papua New Guinean vanilla absolute for greater virility. François Demachy, Dior Perfumer-Creator, drew inspiration from the desert in the magical hour of twilight. Mixed with the coolness of the night, the burning desert air exudes profound fragrances. In the hour when the wolves come out and the sky is set ablaze, a new magic unfolds.

"I didn't create Eau de Parfum Sauvage by working on power. Its signature is already very identifiable. It was not a matter of exaggerating or saturating the composition. I was striving more to enrich each of the dominant notes to give it a new colour." François Demachy, Dior Perfumer-Creator
Reggio Bergamot
François Demachy likes his men's fragrances to open with a snap of citrus. For the house of Dior, he chose an exclusive bergamot that he shaped with local producers to obtain a "custom" signature.
His bergamot is like a whirlwind of juicy freshness that sweeps everything up in its path. Drenched in the Calabrian sun, it is fruitier and develops unique, zesty facets with a tinge of pepper.
Papua New Guinean vanilla absolute
Papua New Guinean vanilla absolute exerts an irresistibly delicious attraction with smoky accents that render it more virile.
Harvested green and then scalded, this exceptional vanilla is processed using a solvent-free extraction method to restore the complex power of its aromas while preserving the environment.

title: Alien
descrip: Eau de Parfum Refillable for her

subProduct.des: FEEL EXTRAORDINARY WITH MUGLER ALIEN EAU DE PARFUM
des_content:
REFILL IN STORE
Bring your empty Angel, Alien or Aura refillable Eau de Parfum bottle into any of our stores and enjoy great savings when you refill it at the MUGLER Fragrance Fountain.

REFILL ONLINE
Our iconic Mugler refillable fragrances are available in a Refill bottle, allowing you to refill your fragrance in the comfort of your own home.
THE FRAGRANCE

Combining comforting floral notes of Jasmine Sambac with Cashmeran Wood and White Amber notes creates a sensual, woody and feminine fragrance.

The mysterious perfume is contained in a precious amethyst stone that can be refilled again and again.
des_about_des: Alien Eau de Parfum, a Woody Floral women’s fragrance by Mugler. Alien Eau de Parfum is an iconic scent by Mugler, a fragrance like no other, the ultimate expression of femininity wrapped in a veil of sensuality.

Embodying a Solar Goddess, radiant and sensual, Alien by Mugler diffuses peace with its scent, thanks to its talisman fragrance. The rich and sensual notes of the Alien perfume reveal a feminine force: a powerful floral scent of jasmine linked to woody and amber notes. An elixir of sensuality and femininity faceted around 3 revelations that merge in total harmony.
Solar revelation
Alien turns solar, illuminated by Jasmine Sambac from India. A sumptuous sun flower whose fragility contrasts with the power of its perfume. A spiritual offering, a promise of sacred femininity.
Mysterious revelation

Alien becomes a mystery, sublimated by the sensual notes of Cashmeran Wood. An enigmatic wood characterised by its assertive musky note, an exotic wood heated by an intense sun that captivates the senses.
Enveloping revelation
Alien is enveloping, enriched with White Amber. Mugler has built a modern and timeless white amber.
Exuding sensuality and mystery, the Alien Eau de Parfum bottle is inspired by an amethyst, a symbol of meditation and inner peace, to reveal the radiance and the creative force of every woman.
Alien Eau de Parfum is endlessly refillable at the Mugler Fountain or thanks to its Refill bottle so you never go without it, enabling you to enjoy great savings whilst being kind to the environment.
INGREDIENTS
ALCOHOL. PARFUM/FRAGRANCE. PROPYLENE GLYCOL. BENZYL SALICYLATE. ETHYLHEXYL
METHOXYCINNAMATE. COUMARIN. LIMONENE. GERANIOL. BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE. ETHYLHEXYL
SALICYLATE. ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE. CITRONELLOL. GLYCERIN. LINALOOL. AQUA/WATER/EAU. BENZYL
ALCOHOL. CITRAL. BENZYL BENZOATE. BHT. CI 60730/EXT. VIOLET 2. CI 17200/RED 33 [C0853D]

subProduct.des: The scent of success. Going for gold because decadence is thrilling. An intoxicating, powerful blend. Starts out fresh - slips into spicy leather. Rose-cinnamon masculine accord. Blond leather, blond wood. An arresting alchemy of full-on seduction.
des_content: 1 MILLION, a provocative, sexy elegance contained in a "leather-spice" accord. Bursting: blood mandarin, peppermint and grapefruit. Intense: absolute of rose and cinnamon. Full-on: blond leather accord, white wood, amber and patchouli.

A blueprint for a gold bar - essentially it's pure. Solidly precious and perfectly smooth. Paco Rabannne's architectural metal-work mode feels near. Flamboyantly minimal. Timelessly cult. By Noé Duchaufour- Lawrance.

des_about.Top notes: Peppermint, Blood Mandarin, Sparkling Fresh Fruits

des_about_des: Paco Rabanne's best selling men’s fragrance, a beautiful, spicy leather scent. A complex Eau de Toilette combining sweet, juicy mandarin and peppermint. Creating intrigue and freshness.
Available in 50ml, 100ml and 200ml bottles.

subProduct.des: Sauvage is an act of creation inspired by wide-open spaces. A composition signed with a raw freshness, between power and nobility.
des_content: An highly concentrated interpretation of Sauvage, melding extreme freshness with warm oriental tones and fierce beauty that comes to life on the skin.
François Demachy, Dior Perfumer-Creator, drew inspiration from unspoiled expanses of wilderness beneath a blue-tinged night sky, as the intense aromas of a crackling fire rise into the air.
The fragrance of a new frontier: an interpretation with an enriched, heady trail that celebrates the magic of wide-open spaces.
des_about_des: DIOR SAUVAGE PARFUM, VIBRANT & FIERCE

A new, highly concentrated interpretation of Sauvage, brightening the scent's signature freshness with the sizzle of a plump and spicy Mandarin. Heady swirls of mellow Tonka Bean with leathery and bitter aromas enlace a trail dominated by sensual Sri Lankan Sandalwood.
OLFACTORY DESCRIPTION
• Mandarin and Bergamot from Reggio di Calabria

For the House of Dior, François Demachy chose an exclusive Bergamot that he shaped with local producers to obtain a custom signature. His Bergamot is a whirlwind of juicy freshness that seems to sweep up everything in its path. Drenched in the Calabrian sun, it is fruitier and develops unique, slightly peppery and zesty facets. For Dior Sauvage Parfum, it welcomes a plump Mandarin note that lends it a fruitier, rounder quality.
• Virginian Cedar and Sandalwood essence from Sri Lanka

Sri Lankan Sandalwood essence heightens and envelops the entire composition. This dense, addictive wood unleashes the full power of its milky, creamy accords. Its sensual note is enchanting, joined by Virginian Cedar that surprises with an unexpected raspberry facet.
• Vanilla absolute from Papua New Guinea

Vanilla absolute from Papua New Guinea unfurls an irresistibly delicious attraction with smoky accents that give it a more powerful touch. Harvested green and then soaked in hot water, this exceptional Vanilla from Papua New Guinea is processed using an innovative extraction method that restores the complex power of its aromas. In Sauvage Parfum, it is wrapped in a slightly bitter, delicious and mouth-watering Tonka Bean.

subProduct.des: Evoking both the splendour of unexplored landscapes and the true nature of man, photographer John Balsom has captured our Explorer and his love of going off the beaten track to climb challenging and unexplored paths. Our traveller is accompanied in his adventures by his trusted tools: a road map, his classic car – an Aston Martin DB6 –, his leather jacket, and his Montblanc EXPLORER fragrance. A stand-out adventurer, he has a clear idea of refinement and elegance and therefore perfectly adapts to anything life throws at him. With a new day ahead of him, our Explorer turns his face towards the summit and like any real adventurer, he is ready for anything and always planning his next challenge...
des_content: Montblanc Explorer is an irresistible call to adventure. This new men's fragrance invites you on a fantastic journey of exploration. A woody-aromatic scent, it has fresh green bergamot notes, contrasted by a rich vetiver and a woody patchouli. Explorer is the perfect scent for the man who is always looking for a new challenge.

The Ingredients

A Woody Leathery Aromatic Fragrance

Top Notes: Bergamot, Pomarose®, Sage

Heart notes: Vetiver, Leather, Sandalwood

Base notes: Patchouli, Ambrofix, Akigalawood®
des_about_des: Winner of Best New Male Fragrance - COPRA 2020

Montblanc Explorer is an invitation to a fantastic journey, an irresistible call for adventure. This unconventional woody-aromatic-leather Eau de Parfum reveals an Italian Bergamot with green fresh notes, contrasted by a rich Vetiver from Haiti and an exclusive Patchouli from Indonesia. At the bottom lies Montblanc’s emblem, the iconic star representing the six glaciers of the highest mountain in Europe.

subProduct.des: The essence of self-confidence, fueled by feel good energies. A futuristic aromatic fragrance born from the clash between luxury craftmanship and new-tech, with ingredients selected to make you feel energized and powerfully confident.
des_content: Phantom is your thrilling ally, to keep by your side and collect. More than a bottle, Phantom is our first connected fragrance. Tap your phone on the 100ml or 150ml bottle, connect to Phantom Universe and unlock exclusive content.
EXCLUSIVELY at The Perfume Shop, discover Phantom in a refillable 150ml bottle. Don't throw your bottle away: keep it & refuel it thanks to the innovative and user-friendly refill.
des_about_des: PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

Phantom: a futuristic aromatic fragrance born from the clash between luxury craftmanship and new-tech. A mind-bending fragrance born from the daring encounter of an energizing green flash of lemon and vetiver and the attraction of an irresistible creamy lavender and woody vanilla. an overdose of feel-good and long-lasting sensations.

subProduct.des: The new BOSS Bottled Marine brings an exhilarating burst of freshness to the iconic BOSS scent.
des_content: Experience ice-cool summer freshness as frozen apple sizzles into the warm and textured woods.
Explore the full BOSS Bottled range to find your perfect fragrance for under the sun.
des_about_des: PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

BOSS Bottled Marine Eau de Toilette brings an exhilarating burst of freshness to the iconic BOSS scent. Frozen apple combines with warm woody notes to evoke the atmosphere of a summer day by the water.

The invigorating scent is defined by bursts of frozen apple and energising spearmint before moving into notes of cinnamon and clary sage. Patchouli and notes of cashmere wood combine in a most sophisticated contrast to marine freshness.

BOSS Bottled Marine is presented in the signature BOSS Bottled glass bottle with a frosted blue finish that reflects the cool freshness of the fragrance. The brushed cap comes in deep, masculine blue for timeless, marine-inspired elegance.

Alcohol Denat., Aqua/water/eau, Parfum/fragrance, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Butyl, Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Linalool, Limonene, Coumarin, Geraniol, Citral, Citronellol, Eugenol, Cinnamal, Citric Acid, Isoeugenol, Ext. Violet 2 (Ci 60730), Blue 1 (Ci 42090)

subProduct.des:
The iconic BOSS Bottled fragrance family celebrates the many facets of modern masculinity, reminding us that every man can be a Man of Today in his own way. Sharing a vibrant and masculine signature, each BOSS Bottled fragrance inspires men around the world to follow their own path forward while staying true to their core values of honesty, integrity, and authenticity.

Starring BOSS Bottled global fragrance ambassador and actor Chris Hemsworth, the Man of Today campaign celebrates the journey towards success and self-fulfillment, a journey where a man's inner life has the same importance as the face he shows to the world.
des_content: Warm, vibrant and unforgettable, BOSS Bottled Eau de Toilette is as versatile and rich in contrasts as the man who wears it. The masculine accords of this timeless composition unfold hour by hour on the skin, inspiring its wearer to make the most of each day. As relevant now as the day it was launched more than 20 years ago, BOSS Bottled Eau de Toilette has become an essential part of the daily routines of men around the world.

The world of BOSS Bottled is brought to life by Australian actor Chris Hemsworth, a man who embodies the multi-faceted vision of a Man of Today. His drive to make the most of every moment and follow his own path forward make him the perfect choice for a campaign that celebrates the diversity of modern masculinity.
des_about_des: PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

The BOSS man is primed to succeed – competitive, driven and ambitious. His daily preparation rituals are integral to his personal quest for success and BOSS Bottled has become an established part of his daily armour. Confident and contemporary: clean lines make BOSS Bottled an iconic classic and the encapsulation of BOSS in a fragrance.

subProduct.des: Push your limits to the extreme. Meet every challenge and win masterfully. The beginning of an addiction to victory and the fragrance to go with it.
des_content: The new Invictus Victory extreme eau de parfum seizes with its power and seduces with its freshness An extreme eau de parfum that subtly celebrates modern masculinity. Strong, captivating and unstoppable. Paco Rabanne unveils a new and extremely powerful fresh oriental.
Let yourself be swept away by the new olfactory composition of Olympéa Blossom: a floral and fresh scent composed by Paco Rabanne for a radiant and confident woman.
des_about_des: Victory is yours.
The atmosphere is electric. Defeat is not an option.
Reach for the sky and achieve your aims.
Push your limits to the extreme.
Accept any challenge and win hands down.
The birth of an addiction to Victory and its accompanying perfume.
The Invictus Victory extreme eau de parfum by Paco Rabanne truly creates an assault on the senses.
Two forces challenge each other in this intense duel: freshness and sensuality.
Paco Rabanne introduces two unique combinations for a long-lasting fragrance. A stunning initial burst of freshness: zesty lemon surrounded by powerful incense.
Next comes a rush of profound sensuality: the roundness of tonka bean sustained by deep vanilla. A match between punchy freshness and magnetic intensity.
Strong, captivating and unstoppable.
Paco Rabanne unveils a new and extremely powerful fresh oriental.
A trophy on a powerful pedestal. The legendary Invictus bottle now boasts a glossy black finish for the very first time.
Its lid also features this new colour: a deep matte black for a striking contrast.
A new intensity transcended by an imposing gold V in the centre.
Victory within your reach.
Ingredients
ALCOHOL DENAT.• PARFUM (FRAGRANCE) • AQUA (WATER) • LIMONENE • LINALOOL • BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE • COUMARIN • CITRONELLOL • CITRAL • GERANIOL • ISOEUGENOL

subProduct.des: Celebrate in gold with the limited-edition BOSS BOTTLED Eau de Parfum, presented in a golden mirror-finish bottle. A fragrance combining the freshness of apple and bergamot notes with intensely addictive cardamom, and the dark elegance of vetiver.
des_content: BOSS Bottled Eau de Parfum brings together exclusively sourced natural ingredients and innovative new extraction methods to create a luxurious spicy-woody scent with a luxurious singularity, and surprising contemporary facets.
An intense and refined masculinity. Created for every driven, ambitious man who is following his own path forward, determined to be a Man of Today in his own way.
des_about_des: PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

Celebrate in gold with the limited edition BOSS Bottled Eau de Parfum. Created for driven, ambitious men ready to take on every challenge that comes their way, this noble composition brings a new intensity to the warmth and vibrancy of the timeless BOSS Bottled signature.

Senses are awakened with a burst of apple and bergamot contrasted with essence of black pepper. The spicy heart unfolds with warm and addictive cardamom and cinnamon oils. Exuding a powerful balance of strength and sophistication, base notes of dark vetiver and musk evolve through time, delivering a leathery and smoky signature.

Composed by master perfumer Honorine Blanc, BOSS Bottled Eau de Parfum brings together exclusively sourced natural ingredients and innovative new extraction methods to create a scent with a luxurious singularity and surprising contemporary facets.
The iconic bottle is presented in a golden mirror-finish for the holiday season and complete with a timelessly elegant brushed golden cap.

subProduct.des: With muscled elegance and boxing gloves on, the new SCANDAL POUR HOMME by Jean Paul Gaultier makes a spectacular, hard-hitting entrance with a masculine eau de toilette that's sensual, energising and extremely addictive. Intoxicating the senses and crowned with victories, this king of the ring seduces his fans with a bang, leaving a mascluine trail contrasted by an intense woody oriental fragrance in a refillable bottle.
des_content: SCANDAL POUR HOMME, the new refillable fragrance for men by Jean Paul Gaultier. An energizing and addictive woody oriental eau de toilette that seduces with a bang!

If you’re spreading SCANDAL, it might as well be eco-friendly with a refillable bottle! This is the battle Jean Paul Gautlier's boxer is fighting for. Its refill will top off your 50, 100 or 150 ml bottle without spilling a drop, thanks to its innovative system that stops automatically once full. A more eco-friendly way to protect the environment by using 59% less glass, 46% less plastic, 89% less metal and 64% less packaging by weight*. A victorious win-win situation that’s scandalously easy and essential.
des_about_des: PRODUCT DESCRIPTION
The new SCANDAL POUR HOMME by Jean Paul Gaultier.

With muscled elegance and boxing gloves on, the new SCANDAL POUR HOMME by Jean Paul Gaultier makes a spectacular, hard-hitting entrance with a masculine eau de toilette that's sensual, energising and extremely addictive. Intoxicating the senses and crowned with victories, this king of the ring seduces his fans with a bang, leaving a mascluine trail contrasted by an intense woody oriental fragrance in a refillable bottle. Keep your guard up: his eco-friendly and athletic charisma knocks out all his opponents. Paris trembles before him and asks for more: let the show begin!
Being an eco-friendly champion is scandalously simple!
STEPS
1. Remove the crown and unscrew the pump from your 50, 100 or 150 ml bottle.
2. Screw on the SCANDAL refill to your bottle all the way to the stop, to trigger the automatic filling process.
3. Once the bottle is full, the refilling process stops automatically. Unscrew the refill from the bottle.
4. Screw the pump back on tightly, before crowning it once more.

METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE,LINALOOL,COUMARIN,ETHYLHEXYL,SALICYLATE, CITRONELLOL, ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE, CITRAL,GERANIOLTRIS(TETRAMETHYLHYDROXYPIPERIDINOL),CITRATE. CI 60730 (EXT. VIOLET 2), CI 19140 (YELLOW 5), CI 14700 (RED 4), CI 42090 (BLUE 1)

subProduct.des: Carolina Herrera starts a new adventure with BAD BOY, a fascinating fragrance that redefines masculinity. He expresses heroism and strength. BAD BOY seduces and captivates as fast and precise as a lighting.
des_content:
BAD BOY is a fragrant expression of duality, representing the bold nature of the modern man. At once strong and sensitive, confident and relaxed, the BAD BOY embraces his contrasting characteristics with assured ease.
BAD BOY Eau de Toilette is a fragrance of layered notes inspired by the BAD BOY’s complexity and harmoniously combined for a distinctive blend of modern sophistication.

GOOD GIRL is inspired by Carolina Herrera’s unique vision of the duality of the modern woman: audacious and sexy, elegant and enigmatic, good and bad. Forever pushing and crossing the limit, the mysterious sensuality of GOOD GIRL makes for a modern yet sophisticated fragrance.

subProduct.des: In the latest episode, together they are shooting stars, riding across the magical cityscape, scaling new heights, challenging themselves and each other.
des_content: Discover Emporio Armani's new fragrance, Stronger With You Intensely. This addictive fougere scent features notes of pink pepper, vanilla and an ambery wood accord. It reflects the personality of today's young man in search of an intense fragrance that lights up his profound love story!

An audacious fragrance due to a contrastful fresh & spicy aromatic top note obtained thanks to the pink pepper. More addictive, with its signature Sugar Coated Chetsnut Accord in overdose. Warm and spicy notes of Cinnamon push the Chestnut at the very heart of the fragrance.
des_about_des: Discover Emporio Armani's STRONGER WITH YOU INTENSELY. It reflects the personality of today's man in search of an intense, longlasting fragrance that lights up his profound love story.

This addictive fougere scent is based on a warm vanilla accord and vibrant ambery woods accord and contrasted with an audacious pink pepper top note. The aged cognac colour perfectly embodies the intense character of the fragrance.
Discover it together with IN LOVE WITH YOU or BECAUSE IT'S YOU - For Her. The two fragrances have an alliance, which balance & empower each other, as a symbol of powerful love.
• An addictive, sensual and longlasting fragrance for him
• For both everyday use and special occasions
• Fragrance Family: Fougere Oriental Woody
• Top Notes: Pink pepper essence
• Heart Notes: Vanilla Essence
• Base Notes: Ambery woods accord
Ingredients

ALCOHOL, PARFUM / FRAGRANCE, AQUA / WATER, COUMARIN, DIETHYLAMINO HYDROXYBENZOYL HEXYL BENZOATE, LIMONENE, ISOEUGENOL, LINALOOL, EUGENOL, CITRONELLOL, BENZYL ALCOHOL, CITRAL, CINNAMAL, CI 14700 / RED 4, CI 15510 / ORANGE 4, GERANIOL, METHYL-2-OCTYNOATE, CI 60730 / EXT. VIOLET 2, CI 42090 / BLUE 1,

title: My Way
descrip: Eau de Parfum Refillable for her

subProduct.des:
Giorgio Armani, designer of timeless fragrances, unveils its new fragrance; MY WAY. Through meaningful connections to others, one finds the path to the truest version of oneself. I AM WHAT I LIVE. MY WAY is inspired by the genuine search for meaning and authenticity that lies outside oneself, ultimately creating a more profound way of being. Through the influence of serendipitous encounters and new experiences, one discovers one’s own multifaceted depths. Intimate yet universal, “I am what I live” encapsulates this ethos.

A fragrance for a new generation, MY WAY encapsulates curiosity and connections, embodied by a woman looking for experiences that challenge her preconceptions and take her into new, unchartered territory. She seeks out meaningful, authentic ways of connecting with others. Through truly learning from others, she reinvents and finds herself. Embodied by authentic and unfiltered beauty, actor Adria Arjona.

MY WAY is a contemporary floral fragrance with a fusion of white flowers at its heart. The fragrance is composed of the finest natural ingredients: Vanilla is sourced from Madagascar through an inclusive program that benefits local communities, while the Tuberose is harvested in India. In creating the notes, craftsmanship meets innovation, as the Tuberose heart is extracted using molecular distillation, allowing the perfumers to select the creamy, velvety facets tailor-made for MY WAY. The Orange blossom note is extracted in Egypt using an innovative, exclusive and entirely natural enfleurage process, whose cold extraction method infuses the Orange flowers in Orange essence. The artisanal approach finally translates in the manual weighing and blending of the fragrance’s concentrate in Grasse creates pure, highly-refined notes with enhanced radiance and naturality.
des_content: Exemplifying Giorgio Armani beauty’s commitment to the environment, the MY WAY bottle reinvents fine fragrance for a more sustainable future. Created with an innovative and seamless refill system, with all its components recyclable, MY WAY ‘s bottle makes it effortless to both reduce waste and recycle more.

Reuse your My Way fragrance bottle and refill it from home. The innovative 150ml refill bottle fits with all of the sizes available to purchase at The Perfume Shop. The refill bottle uses 64% less plastic and 55% less glass.

des_about.Top notes: BERGAMOT FROM CALABRIA & ORANGE BLOSSOM FROM EGYPT
des_about.Base notes: CEDARWOOD FROM VIRGINIA, VANILLA FROM MADAGASCAR & WHITE MUSKS

des_about_des: INTRODUCING MY WAY; THE NEW FEMININE FRAGRANCE BY GIORGIO ARMANI Giorgio Armani, designer of timeless fragrances, unveils its new fragrance; MY WAY. Through meaningful connections to others, one finds the path to the truest version of oneself.
I AM WHAT I LIVE

MY WAY is inspired by the genuine search for meaning and authenticity that lies outside oneself, ultimately creating a more profound way of being. Through the influence of serendipitous encounters and new experiences, one discovers one’s own multifaceted depths. Intimate yet universal, 'I am what I live' encapsulates this ethos.
FINDING ON HER OWN PATH

A fragrance for a new generation, MY WAY encapsulates curiosity and connections, embodied by a woman looking for experiences that challenge her preconceptions and take her into new, unchartered territory. She seeks out meaningful, authentic ways of connecting with others. Through truly learning from others, she reinvents and finds herself.

Embodied by authentic and unfiltered beauty, actor Adria Arjona. She is curious and open. Learning from others, whilst discovering the world is how she forms a stronger sense of self. 'You can take anything away from me, but you can’t take away what I’ve lived' Adria Arjona, Global Ambassador for MY WAY.
CAPTURING MEANINGFUL ENCOUNTERS OF THE WORLD

MY WAY is a contemporary floral fragrance with a fusion of white flowers at its heart. The fragrance is composed of the finest natural ingredients: Vanilla is sourced from Madagascar through an inclusive program that benefits local communities, while the Tuberose is harvested in India. In creating the notes, craftsmanship meets innovation, as the Tuberose heart is extracted using molecular distillation, allowing the perfumers to select the creamy, velvety facets tailor-made for MY WAY. The Orange blossom note is extracted in Egypt using an innovative, exclusive and entirely natural enfleurage process, whose cold extraction method infuses the Orange flowers in Orange essence. The artisanal approach finally translates in the manual weighing and blending of the fragrance’s concentrate in Grasse creates pure, highly-refined notes with enhanced radiance and naturality. Created by Master perfumer Carlos Benaïm and senior perfumer Bruno Jovanovic (IFF).
CAPTURING LIVED EXPERIENCES IN A BOTTLE

MY WAY’s sleek design and transparent glass, combined with vibrant pink juice, explore the multiple facets of femininity and gives light and luminosity. The deep blue rounded cap, a new interpretation of the iconic Armani stone, acts as a metaphor for the planet and encapsulates all of ones experiences with others. With a golden ring around the cap and real rich fabric around the collar, creating a timeless couture accessory.

An elegant bottle of true Armani contrasts acting as a talisman as you find your own path. Storytelling and precious, but also responsible. Exemplifying Giorgio Armani beauty’s commitment to the environment, the MY WAY bottle reinvents fine fragrance for a more sustainable future. Created with an innovative and seamless refill system, with all its components recyclable, MY WAY‘s bottle makes it effortless to both reduce waste and recycle more.
CAPTURING A LIVED EXPERIENCE

Directed and photographed by Hunter & Gatti, the MY WAY campaign captures Adria Arjona’s adventure, with the Spanish creative duo following her as she experiences meaningful encounters with people and places around the world. More than a campaign, the unretouched film is a live experience capturing Adria as she arrives at these authentic moments of connection with others, through the rituals of their diverse cultures.

The introduction of MY WAY also reflects of Giorgio Armani’s long-standing commitment to sustainability, through actions such as its innovative, refillable and recyclable flacon, and opens a new era of sustainability with a new ambition: fight against climate change.
• Fragrance Family
FLORAL
• Top Notes
BERGAMOT FROM CALABRIA & ORANGE BLOSSOM FROM EGYPT
• Heart Notes
TUBEROSE & JASMINE FROM INDIA
• Base Notes
CEDARWOOD FROM VIRGINIA, VANILLA FROM MADAGASCAR & WHITE MUSKS
• Key Notes
A bright floral bouquet of tuberose, jasmine and orange blossom enhanced by a vibrant cedarwood and a warm vanilla.
Ingredients

Alcohol, Parfum / Fragrance, Aqua / Water, Linalool, Benzyl Salicylate, Benzyl Alcohol, Hydroxycitronellal, Limonene, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Methyl Anthranilate, Hexyl Cinnamal, Geraniol, Citronellol, Eugenol, Citral, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Tris(Tetramethylhydroxypiperidinol) Citrate, Isoeugenol, Cinnamal, Benzyl Benzoate, Ci 17200 / Red 33, Ci 60730 / Ext. Violet 2

subProduct.des: The latest men's fragrance by Jean Paul Gaultier, Le Male Le Parfum, is about to set sail! Dressed in a black and gold officer’s jacket, this intense eau de parfum is taking leadership of the Le Male range with great style and strength. An elegant woody oriental trail capturing the charisma and power of a leader. Attention sailors! The captain has arrived and we’re about to set sail.
des_content: Drawing on the potency of cardamom in its top notes and the freshness of lavender and iris at its heart, this intense eau de parfum ultimately promises to immerse you in its wonderfully addictive and prominent vanilla base note. An olfactory odyssey full of contrasts to disorient and delight the senses, its masculine trail revealing the charisma of an officer.

Dressed head-to-toe in black, wearing an officer’s uniform trimmed with gold, the new intense Le Male Le Parfum eau de parfum commands respect in matte and shiny sailor stripes. Of course, the charm of this leader also has potential to make waves.
des_about_des: The latest men's fragrance by Jean Paul Gaultier, Le Male Le Parfum, is about to set sail! Dressed in a black and gold officer’s jacket, this intense eau de parfum is taking leadership of the Le Male range with great style and strength. An elegant woody oriental trail capturing the charisma and power of a leader. Attention sailors! The captain has arrived and we’re about to set sail.
Drawing on the potency of cardamom in its top notes and the freshness of lavender and iris at its heart, this intense eau de parfum ultimately

promises to immerse you in its wonderfully addictive and prominent vanilla base note. An olfactory odyssey full of contrasts to disorient and delight the senses, its masculine trail revealing the charisma of an officer.
Dressed head-to-toe in black, wearing an officer’s uniform trimmed with gold, the new intense Le Male Le Parfum eau de parfum commands respect in matte
and shiny sailor stripes. Of course, the charm of this leader also has potential to make waves.

Welcome aboard Le Male Le Parfum, complete with iconic Jean Paul Gaultier tin. Shiny and metallic, strong and reassuring, its stylish masculine shades of black and deep brown are further enhanced by the burnished gold that distinguishes officers.

subProduct.des: 1 Million Parfum has the audacity of leather. An intensely masculine scent, with sun-drenched charm. The fragrance dares to push boundaries and plays with the senses. A duality between salty notes and leather. A fragrance with amber heat for an exacerbated sensuality. 1 Million Parfum is addictive, like gold. Like an emblem carved in metal, this fragrance is for those who dare to stand out amongst the millions. Be excessive. Bold. Exaggerate, just a little.
des_content: How to become 1 Million among Millions? Be excessive with your style. By exaggerating, just enough. Always be bold. Dare to be too much. Make 1 Million Parfum your own. A unique fragrance. Among Millions.
How to build an empire Million style? Risk it all. Never stop. Desire your destiny. Lady MILLION EMPIRE, fragrance for women. Brilliant magnolia flower on cognac-addiction. A floral chypre.

des_about.Top notes: Salty Pulse: Salty Tuberose Notes, Ambroxan, Cashmeran
des_about.Heart notes: Leathery Opulence: Notes of Sun-Drenched Leather, Citrus Resin

des_about_des: How to be 1 Million among Millions?
Be confident with your style.
Do not be afraid to be outrageous.
Be brave enough to be too much. To be 1 Million.
1 MILLION Parfum. A solar-leather scent with salty notes, warm on skin. Full beam-gleam. A perfume with power. Time to make your mark.
Sun-drenched leather with salty effects. A warm deliberate scent on the edge of the extreme.
OLFACTORY UNIVERSE
Salty pulse: "tuberous salty" textured by amber woods. Leather opulence: accord "solar leather" patinated with notes of resin and pine.
THE SPOKESPERSON

24 years old and a brilliant energy. Charisma to spare. His name is Joey Bada$$, and he’s one of the superstars of the international hip hop scene. Born in Brooklyn, this young American rap prodigy is also an actor (Mr. Robot with Rami Malek, among others) and an entrepreneur. A committed, respected artist, he lends his voice to those who cannot be heard. His motto: to be free and proud, and above all, to keep his head held high. He is getting ready to release a new solo album in 2020.

subProduct.des:
The iconic BOSS Bottled fragrance family celebrates the many facets of modern masculinity, reminding us that every man can be a Man of Today in his own way. Sharing a vibrant and masculine signature, each BOSS Bottled fragrance inspires men around the world to follow their own path forward while staying true to their core values of honesty, integrity, and authenticity.

Starring BOSS Bottled global fragrance ambassador and actor Chris Hemsworth, the Man of Today campaign celebrates the journey towards success and self-fulfillment, a journey where a man's inner life has the same importance as the face he shows to the world.
des_content: BOSS Bottled Eau de Parfum brings together exclusively sourced natural ingredients and innovative new extraction methods to create a luxurious spicy-woody scent with a luxurious singularity, and surprising contemporary facets.

An intense and refined masculinity. Created for every driven, ambitious man who is following his own path forward, determined to be a Man of Today in his own way.

The Eau de Parfum brings a new intensity to the warmth and vibrancy of the timeless BOSS Bottled signature that has been a favourite with men for more than 20 years.
des_about_des: PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

title: Angel
descrip: Eau de Parfum Refillable Gift Set - 25ML

subProduct.des:
Angel is a mouth-watering delicious and sensual fragrance, a delicate blend of sweet Red Fruits, Soft Caramel, Honey and Praline combined with the captivating power of Patchouli and Vanilla.

This gift set contains: Eau de Parfum 25ml, Body lotion 50ml & Miniature Eau de Parfum spray 10ml

des_about.Heart notes: Berries (red), Hedoine, Honey accord, Blackcurrant buds (Cassis), Dewberry
des_about.Base notes: Sandalwood (Australian), Almond (Sugared), Vanilla, Patchouli, Caramel, Coumarin

des_about_des: PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

Explore the MUGLER Galaxy this Christmas and immerse yourself in the delectable, celestial, and voluptuous universe of Angel. Housed in an elegant 100% plastic free gift box, this gift set is a sensual and irresistible present for her.

Angel Eau de Parfum is an Oriental gourmand women’s fragrance by Mugler, a bold, sensual and voluptuous fragrance, tinged with childhood memories. A fragrance that is as seductive and passionate as the woman who wears it, blending sweet red fruits, soft caramel, honey and praline, combined with the captivating power of patchouli and vanilla.

MUGLER is committed to a more responsible luxury: the Angel Eau de Parfum Star can be endlessly refilled at the MUGLER Fragrance Fountain or thanks to the Refill Bottle so you never go without it, enabling you to enjoy great savings whilst being kind to the environment.

Envelop yourself in Angel with the Angel Perfuming Body Lotion. This gentle, lightweight, blue-toned emulsion intensely perfumes the skin with notes of the Angel fragrance and makes it soft and silky smooth. The patented Intense Diffusion System® technology, encapsulated in the texture of the Angel Body Lotion, amplifies the diffusion of the fragrance.

Take the scent of Angel in the shower with Angel Perfuming Shower Gel. This fluid, blue-toned gel transforms into a fine, creamy mousse in the shower and invigorates the skin with its intense Angel fragrance.

ALCOHOL. PARFUM/FRAGRANCE. AQUA/WATER/EAU. BUTYLPHENYL METHYLPROPIONAL. ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE. BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE. ETHYLHEXYL SALICYLATE. BHT. COUMARIN. LIMONENE. LINALOOL. GERANIOL. AMYL CINNAMAL. CITRONELLOL. BENZYL SALICYLATE. CITRAL. FARNESOL. HEXYL CINNAMAL. EUGENOL. BENZYL BENZOATE. ISOEUGENOL. CI 60730/EXT. VIOLET 2. CI 19140/YELLOW 5. CI 42090/BLUE 1. CI 17200/RED 33.

AQUA/WATER/EAU.ALCOHOL.PARFUM/FRAGRANCE.DIMETHICONE.CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE.GLYCERIN.CETYL ALCOHOL.BUTYROSPERMUM PARKII (SHEA) BUTTER.POTASSIUM CETYL PHOSPHATE.COUMARIN.BUTYLPHENYL METHYLPROPIONAL.ACRYLATES/C10-30 ALKYL ACRYLATE CROSSPOLYMER.ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN.BENZYL SALICYLATE.LIMONENE.SODIUM HYDROXIDE.DISODIUM EDTA.CARBOMER.LINALOOL.PHENOXYETHANOL.BIOSACCHARIDE GUM-1.BHT.GERANIOL.AMYL CINNAMAL.CITRONELLOL.HEXYL CINNAMAL.BENZYL BENZOATE.EUGENOL.CI 60730/EXT. VIOLET 2.CI 42090/BLUE 1.

AQUA/WATER/EAU. SODIUM LAURETH SULFATE. GLYCERIN. COCAMIDOPROPYL BETAINE. PARFUM/FRAGRANCE. DECYL GLUCOSIDE. SODIUM BENZOATE. ALOE BARBADENSIS LEAF JUICE. CITRIC ACID. PHENOXYISOPROPANOL. COUMARIN. ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE. BUTYLPHENYL METHYLPROPIONAL. POLYQUATERNIUM-7. LIMONENE. BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE. ETHYLHEXYL SALICYLATE. LINALOOL. SAPONARIA.
- Eau de Parfum Refillable Spray (25ml)
- Body Lotion (50ml)
- Shower gel (50ml)

subProduct.des:
Le Male Eau de Toilette will add a distinguished touch to any man’s collection.
Distinguished by its chiselled, sailor-inspired bottle (a tribute to the designer’s muse) it stands out at a first glance as well as at first spritz – which will make it an easy one to reach for in the mornings in anticipation of a long day of work.
des_content:
A firm favourite since it bounded on the scene back in 1995, you’ll be hard-pushed to find any faults with this magnetic concoction.

Fresh? Check, it opens with a hint of mint. Unique? Check, the warming lavender is an intriguing inclusion at the heart. Masculine? Check, the cinnamon and cumin rank well on the ‘macho’ scale.

Part of Jean Paul Gaultier’s signature his and hers range, Classique Eau de Toilette, a tribute to the beauty of women. Etched on the transparent glass is the quintessential item in Jean Paul Gaultier's female wardrobe: the corset,a symbol of seduction and extreme sensuality.

The iconoclastic designer takes an everyday object and transforms it into the now famous case: the tin can.

des_about.Base notes: Sandalwood, Vanilla, Cedar, Tonka bean, Amber

des_about_des: Le Male Eau de Toilette will add a distinguished touch to any man’s collection. Distinguished by its chiselled, sailor-inspired bottle (a tribute to the designer’s muse) it stands out at a first glance as well as at first spritz – which will make it an easy one to reach for in the mornings in anticipation of a long day of work.

subProduct.des: Debuting alongside the fragrance is the exclusive Eilish campaign video starring Billie Eilish.
des_content:
“The inspiration for this campaign was an appreciation for the human body. It’s really about embracing yourself, being confident, and loving how you look and the way you feel. I wanted it to be very inviting, but also intimidating, comforting and a little bit romantic and dreamy.”
- Billie Eilish.

Eilish is a captivating Amber Gourmand that attracts you with a warm, cozy scent that feels like home no matter where you are. The fragrance opens with sugared petals, accented by juicy mandarin and red berries. The heart of the fragrance unfolds with soft spices, rich cocoa, and creamy vanilla. The scent is anchored by base notes of warm musks, tonka bean, and sleek woods. The bottle is inspired by Billie’s favorite parts of the body: the chest, neck, and collarbone, and is gilded in beautiful amber-bronze..

des_about.Top notes: Sugared petals, mandarin and red berries
des_about.Heart notes: Creamy vanilla, soft spices and cocoa
des_about.Base notes: Warm musks, tonka beans and sleek woods

des_about_des: PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

Eilish is a captivating Amber Gourmand that attracts you with a warm, cozy scent that feels like home no matter where you are. The fragrance opens with sugared petals, accented by juicy mandarin and red berries. The heart of the fragrance unfolds with soft spices, rich cocoa, and creamy vanilla. The scent is anchored by base notes of warm musks, tonka bean, and sleek woods. The bottle is inspired by Billie’s favorite parts of the body: the chest, neck, and collarbone, and is gilded in beautiful amber-bronze.
Please reference safety warnings.

ALCOHOL DENAT., FRAGRANCE (PARFUM), WATER (AQUA), CITRIC ACID, ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE, ETHYLHEXYL SALICYLATE, PROPYLENE GLYCOL, LINALOOL, HEXYL CINNAMAL, ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE, BENZYL SALICYLATE, BENZYL BENZOATE, LIMONENE, YELLOW 5, RED 4, BLUE 1.

subProduct.des: Discover 1 Million Elixir, the pinnacle of intensity from Paco Rabanne — a new fragrance guided by a desire for supreme quality
des_content:
Paco Rabanne Lady Million Fabulous is an oriental fragrance where sparkling white florals clash with a deeply seductive base, resulting in a floral female fragrance.

Vibrant pink-pepper and fresh mandarin introduce a radiant solar-floral bouquet; with jasmine, ylang-ylang and creamy tuberose. Elegant moss and tonka bean add a contrasting powerful glow that shimmers with rich vanilla — creating a lasting and addictive, sensual warmth and long lasting scent.
des_about_des: PRODUCT DESCRIPTION
The pinnacle of absolute intensity.
Discover 1 Million Elixir, the pinnacle of intensity from Million, a new fragrance guided by a desire for supreme quality.
1 Million Elixir is a blend of hand-picked ingredients collected from across the globe, celebrating our perfumers' craftmanship and the fusion of the finest raw ingredients.
A new dimension, unbelievably intense, unmistakably 1 Million.
The iconic 1 Million gold bar, bolder, distinct and sophisticated. A crafted jewel reflecting the different facets of the fragrance.
The sign of a new strength: solid, intense and enigmatic. The preciously crafted bottle encapsulates the soul and essence of 1 Million, the infinite depth of this new olfactory creation.
The pinnacle of absolute intensity.
1 Million Elixir, richer than ever before, for thrilling sensations.
The hand-picked ingredients, Turkish Damascena rose, osmanthus and wild grown tonka beans, undoubtedly make this masterpiece composition stand out by the extreme quality of its raw materials.
Deeply sensual, liquorous davana vibrates with the power of smooth woods and black vanilla seeds. Supreme sensuality meets absolute long-lasting power.

subProduct.des: Discover My Way Intense, Giorgio Armani's new feminine fragrance. An amplified bright floral bouquet on an addictive woody trail, encapsulating intense experiences and authentic encounters around the world. Live your way, intensely. My Way intense is an invitation to a journey of self-discovery, meaningful encounters and amplified experiences. An amplified florality on an addictive woody trail, made of consciously sourced ingredients. The scent opens with bright notes of orange blossom from Egypt. A new intense heart of tuberose from India unveils a creamy and velvety facet of the floral signature. At the base of the fragrance, the sandalwood from New Caledonia takes an addictive creamy turn, as it meets a voluptuous Vanilla from Madagascar
des_content: Exemplifying Giorgio Armani beauty’s commitment to the environment, the MY WAY INTENSE bottle reinvents fine fragrance for a more sustainable future. Created with an innovative and seamless refill system, with all its components recyclable, MY WAY ‘s bottle makes it effortless to both reduce waste and recycle more. Reuse your My Way Intense fragrance bottle and refill it from home. The innovative 150ml refill bottle fits with all of the sizes available to purchase at The Perfume Shop. The refill bottle uses 64% less plastic and 55% less glass.

des_about.Base notes: SANDALWOOD FROM NEW CALEDONIA & VANILLA FROM MADAGASCAR

des_about_des: PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

My Way intense is an invitation to a journey of self-discovery, meaningful encounters and amplified experiences. An amplified florality on an addictive woody trail, made of consciously sourced ingredients. The scent opens with bright notes of orange blossom from Egypt. A new intense heart of tuberose from India unveils a creamy and velvety facet of the floral signature. At the base of the fragrance, the sandalwood from New Caledonia takes an addictive creamy turn, as it meets a voluptuous Vanilla from Madagascar.
Apply on pulse point: wrist, inner elbow and neck.

ALCOHOL • PARFUM / FRAGRANCE • AQUA / WATER • LINALOOL • BENZYL SALICYLATE • BENZYL ALCOHOL • LIMONENE • BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE • HEXYL CINNAMAL • CITRONELLOL • METHYL ANTHRANILATE • HYDROXYCITRONELLAL • GERANIOL • EUGENOL • CITRAL • ISOEUGENOL • TRIS(TETRAMETHYLHYDROXYPIPERIDINOL) CITRATE • BENZYL BENZOATE • CI 14700 / RED 4 • CI 60730 / EXT. VIOLET 2 • CI 17200 / RED 31

subProduct.des: K by Dolce&Gabbana is a fragrance which celebrates a new era of masculinity. It conjures the Italian countryside and the Mediterranean midday sun with a combination of citrus freshness, blood orange and Sicilian lemon, with a spark of spicy pimento essence yielding to an earthy vetiver.
des_content: Each cap is unique. A blue lapis dome is ringed by a crown covered with 24 carat gold. It majestically thrones on a bottle built along affirmed and masculine lines, featuring a crowned letter K that evokes the traditional symbol of royalty.

des_about.Top notes: Citrus, Sparkling Blood Orange, Juniper Berry

des_about_des: K by Dolce&Gabbana.
A new era of masculinity.

Instantly conjuring the Italian countryside and the Mediterranean midday sun, the warm, enveloping embrace of K by Dolce&Gabbana evokes the fresh, earthy scent of wooded Tuscan hills. The fragrance invigorates the senses with an intense combination of citrus fresh blood orange and Sicilian lemon, amber accents of clary sage, crisp geranium and energising lavandin, a fresh bite of juniper berry and a spark of fiery pimento essence. Then comes a sensual cedarwood note, merging with earthy vetiver, before yielding to the sweet spiciness of patchouli, to intensify the innate charisma of a modern day king.

subProduct.des:
Armani Code gives you the key to enter the Giorgio Armani universe. A world made of sophistication and elegance, where seduction is a lifestyle.

The first oriental fragrance for men from Giorgio Armani. Timelessly sensual, Code Homme combines a citron cocktail of bergamot and lemon, warmed with Guaiac wood and Tonka Bean. The iconic men’s fragrance and first of its range makes the perfect gift form him.
des_about_des: Giorgio Armani Code - The Aftershave For Him Timelessly sensual, in a pure and understated way this aftershave for him was the first oriental fragrance created by Giorgio Armani. A combination of citrus and wood for a cologne that strikes the perfect harmony of sophistication and seduction.

This eau de toilette is a citron cocktail of bergamot and lemon with soft notes of olive tree blossom, warmed with Guaiac wood and Tonka Bean – a favourite in men’s fragrance. An evocative scent of tuxedos and exclusive parties, seduction is at the heart of this aftershave for him. The midnight-blue colour of the bottle was inspired by the famous Armani tuxedo worn by Denzel Washington to the Hollywood Oscar ceremony. Dressed to impress, this cologne is perfect for day or evening wear with a smart edge.

Iconic by nature, Armani CODE EAU DE TOILETTE would be best suited as a luxurious birthday, wedding, or anniversary gift. Cased in a tuxedo sculpted bottle, the metal belt below the cap is inspired by the tuxedo cummerbund that completes evening attire – perfect to gift for a special occasion such as graduation.
Looking for something fresher and lighter? Try Armani CODE COLONIA eau de toilette.
Looking for something more intense? Try Armani CODE PROFUMO eau de parfum.
Looking for something more spicy oriental? Try Armani CODE ABSOLU eau de parfum.
• Fragrance Family: Citrus Woody Oriental
• Top Notes: Citron, Olive Flower
• Heart Notes: Star Anise
• Base Notes: Guaiac Wood
• Key Notes
Citron, Olive Flower, Star Anise, Guaiac Wood
ALCOHOL ●AQUA / WATER ●PARFUM / FRAGRANCE ●LIMONENE ●LINALOOL ●COUMARIN ●HYDROXYCITRONELLAL ●ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE ●HEXYL CINNAMAL ●GERANIOL ●CITRONELLOL ●CITRAL ●

subProduct.des:
"There can be nothing without love. When you wake up in the morning, you need to know that somebody else is waking up, thinking of you."

Giorgio Armani
des_content:
Stronger With You is a masculine scent featuring spicy accords in the top notes of - a mix of cardamom, pink peppercorn, and violet leaves. Stronger With You has inherited a confident elegance, with the easy nonchalance of youth, conveyed by the sage at its aromatic heart. These notes combine with the smoky Vanilla Jungle Essence™ and the sugar coated chestnut accord, producing an irresistible men’s fragrance.

New to the range, the aftershave brought to life in a shower gel.

The two fragrances, Stronger With You for Him and Because It’s You for Her are the symbol of a personal love story of Giorgio Armani. Mr. Armani wears two single rings, one belongs to him, the other belonged to his life time partner, Sergio Galeotti. This double ring design was Mr. Armani’s inspiration for the caps of the bottles.

Discover the power of two with Stronger With You - For Him. Along with Emporio Armani’s Because It’s You – For Her, the two fragrances have an alliance which balance & empower each other, as a symbol of powerful love.

Together Stronger

des_about.Top notes: Pink Pepper Essence, Apple Accord, Violet Leaves Accord
des_about.Heart notes: Lavender Essence, Sage Essence, Cardamom Essence, Cinnamon Essence
des_about.Base notes: Glazed Chestnut Accord, Cedar Tree Essence, Guaiac essence, Amber Wood

des_about_des: Discover Emporio Armani's STRONGER WITH YOU, the aftershave, a warm and sensual eau de toilette for him STRONGER WITH YOU is a masculine fragrance featuring spicy accords in the top notes of - a mix of cardamom, pink peppercorn, and violet leaves.

This cologne has inherited a confident elegance, with the easy nonchalance of youth, conveyed by the sage at its aromatic heart. These notes combine with the smoky Vanilla Jungle Essence™ and the sugar coated chestnut accord, producing an irresistible men’s fragrance.
Discover it together with IN LOVE WITH YOU or BECAUSE IT'S YOU - For Her. The two fragrances have an alliance, which balance & empower each other, as a symbol of powerful love. TOGETHERSTRONGER
• Fragrance Family: Oriental Fougere
• Top Notes: Pink Pepper Essence, Apple Accord, Violet Leaves Accord
• Heart Notes: Lavender Essence, Sage Essence, Cardamom Essence, Cinnamon Essence
• Base Notes: Glazed Chestnut Accord, Cedar Tree Essence, Guaiac essence, Amber Wood
• An addictive, energetic aftershave and a confidence boost for him.
Ingredients

ALCOHOL, PARFUM / FRAGRANCE, AQUA / WATER, BENZOTRIAZOLYL DODECYL p-CRESOL, LIMONENE, LINALOOL, COUMARIN, ISOEUGENOL, CITRONELLOL, ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE, EUGENOL, CITRAL, BENZYL ALCOHOL, TRIS(TETRAMETHYLHYDROXYPIPERIDINOL) CITRATE, GERANIOL, CINNAMAL, METHYL-2-OCTYNOATE, CI 19140 / YELLOW 5, CI 14700 / RED 4, CI 60730 / EXT. VIOLET 2.

subProduct.des: Playful and seductive... introducing TOY BOY, the new iconic fragrance by Moschino. The stunning teddy bear shaped bottle reveals an elegant spicy and woody fragrance that is delicious, daring and utterly addictive.
des_content: The fragrance is a blend of premium and innovative ingredients. Vibrant notes of Italian bergamot, pink berries, nutmeg and pear leaves are seductively blended with clove, rose and magnolia. The base is a captivating mix of vetiver, cashmere wood and amber.
The campaign, shot by photographer Giampaolo Sgura and directed by Jeremy Scott, features Brazilian model Jhona Burjack, clad top-to-toe in leather biker gear.

des_about.Top notes: Italian Bergamot, Pink Berries, Indonesian Nutmeg, Pear, Elemi
des_about.Heart notes: Clove, Rose Absolute, Flax Flowers, Magnolia

des_about_des: Toy Boy eau de parfum is the new men’s fragrance by Moschino that reinterprets elegance with a touch of irony. It speaks to a unique, dynamic and passionate man, but one who is not afraid to reveal his more tender and playful side. Housed in a stunning black glass bottle with a lacquered, glossy effect and a luxurious silver finish, Moschino’s Toy Boy fragrance is made using premium quality, innovative ingredients. Created by perfumer Yann Vasnier, top notes of Italian bergamot, pink berries, Indonesian nutmeg, pear and elemi give way to a heart of clove, rose absolute, flax flowers and magnolia. A dry-down of cashmeran, Haitian vetiver, ambermax and sylkolide rounds out this seductive and playful Spicy-Woody-Ambery fragrance.

subProduct.des:
Whether you wear it as a women's perfume or a men's aftershave, the forever fresh fragrance of ck one will inspire you to be your most youthful, free-spirited self.

CK One is a sexy citrus floral that balances brightness and sensuality, so you and your partner can mist it over pulse points day or night.

With its frosted perfume bottle and minimalist pack in recycled carton, ck one was, is, and always will be revolutionary.
des_content: A green tea accord travels through the scent, contributing to the signature identity of ck one. The fragrance begins with bright notes of mandarin orange, papaya, bergamot, and lemon. The heart comes to life with an aromatic harmony of nutmeg, violet, jasmine, lily-of-the-valley and rose. The drydown is a sensual combination of musk and amber.
des_about_des: CK One embodies a universal spirit for a diverse world. It is an iconic fragrance that is unapologetically bold, yet exudes youthful, fresh simplicity. Celebrating individuality and unity, this fragrance evokes the excitement of limitless opportunity.

Bringing together refreshing notes of green tea, papaya, and bergamot. Perfectly balanced with soft accents of nutmeg, violet, cardamom, and rose. Compelling and dynamic, CK One is a dialogue between the masculine and feminine.
CK One is revolutionary, rejecting traditional gender stereotypes and harmonizing feminine floral and masculine musk into one unisex scent, appealing to men and women alike.
This fragrance carries fresh notes of green tea while embracing the sweetness of amber and musk.
An aftershave and perfume for men and women.

title: Idôle
descrip: Eau de Parfum Refillable for her

subProduct.des:
Here’s to the women who dare to dream. The women who defy expectations. Here’s to the leaders and innovators of tomorrow. Strong. Outspoken. Empowered. The women who look to themselves for the inspiration they need to rewrite the future. Here’s to a new generation of icons.
The time is now. Be your own Idôle.

Structured like a kaleidoscope, Idôle’s fragrant accords radiate from its heart, Powerful in its simplicity, Idôle’s ultra-slim refillable* bottle radiates light. Simply by wearing Idôle a distinctive scent identity is created. Harnessing the essence of the woman wearing it, Idôle becomes a declaration of her intention to be herself. To become her own Idôle.
des_content:
Artist, activist, leader, Zendaya embodies the courage and conviction that powers women who refuse to be constrained by convention. She will not be defined by a single talent or restricted by expectations.Bold, unapologetic and brave, she fearlessly forges her own path.
she is her own Idôle. .

Powerful in its simplicity, Idôle’s ultra-slim refillable* bottle radiates light. So sleek is its design that it almost belongs in the hand, a reminder that endless possibilities are within reach.

*Refilable in selected doors only.

des_about.Heart notes: Rose Accord & Oil of Jasmin Absolutes

des_about_des: Lancôme introduces Idôle. A sleek, refillable bottle housing a fresh fragrance with notes of rose, jasmine and chypre.

Here’s to the women who dare to dream. The women who defy expectations. Here’s to the leaders and innovators of tomorrow. Strong. Outspoken. Empowered. The women who look to themselves for the inspiration they need to rewrite the future. Here’s to a generation of icons. The time is now. Be your own Idôle. Support a more sustainable future with this refillable bottle.
A BOTTLE FOR A FUTURE WITHOUT LIMITATIONS.
Powerful in its simplicity, Idôle’s ultra-slim bottle radiates light. So sleek is its design that it almost belongs in the hand, a reminder that endless possibilities are within reach.
Refill Idôle. Be a part of a sustainable future.
HOW TO USE:
Spray Idole Eau De Parfum onto your skin, focusing on the warm areas of your body: the inside of your wrists, below your earlobes and behind your knees.
FRAGRANCE NOTES:
POWERFUL AND BEAUTIFUL

With its alluring scent and sharp thorns, the rose symbolises the complexity of femininity. The perfect marriage of beauty and strength, a sustainably sourced Rose Accord can be found in the heart of Idôle.
PURE AND SENSUAL
Oil of Jasmine Absolutes acts as a gentle yet generous accompaniment to Idôle’s heart. Radiant and sensual, it is an invitation to draw closer.
DELICATE AND LONG LASTING

An abundance of radiant petals blended with musks form a sophisticated Clean Chypre Accord, which recalls the airy freshness of just-washed linens. Despite its breezy subtlety, the note lingers on the skin to create a lasting enveloping sensation of reassurance.

Structured like a kaleidoscope, Idôle’s fragrant accords radiate from its heart. Simply by wearing Idôle a distinctive scent identity is created. Harnessing the essence of the woman wearing it, Idôle becomes a declaration of her intention to be herself. To become her own Idôle.
INGREDIENTS:

ALCOHOL • PARFUM / FRAGRANCE • AQUA / WATER • METHYL ANTHRANILATE • TRIS(TETRAMETHYLHYDROXYPIPERIDINOL) CITRATE • ETHYLHEXYL SALICYLATE • BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE • CI 14700 / RED 4 • CI 60730 / EXT. VIOLET 2 • LINALOOL • GERANIOL • EUGENOL • ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE • METHYL-2-OCTYNOATE • COUMARIN • FARNESOL • LIMONENE • HYDROXYCITRONELLAL • CITRAL • CITRONELLOL • HEXYL CINNAMAL • BENZYL ALCOHOL • BENZYL BENZOATE • BENZYL SALICYLAT * This ingredient list is subject to change, customers should refer to the product packaging for the most up-to-date ingredient list.

subProduct.des: Discover Hero, Burberry’s vision of modern heroism. Exploring the house codes of duality and the power of the animal kingdom, the fragrance embraces duality: strength and subtlety, power and compassion, athleticism and creativity. Brightened with bergamot, juniper meets a trio of warm cedarwood oils.
des_content: Fresh, luminous and bold, the scent is brightened with sparkling bergamot and invigorated with juniper and black pepper. Juniper, a classic British ingredient of the perfumer’s palette, brings a vibrant freshness to the scent, and is deepened by a trio of warm cedarwood oils from three distinct mountain ranges; Virginia’s Apalacian, the Atlas Mountains in Africa, and the Himalayas in Asia.

Burberry Hero bottle is a modern reimagination of Burberry Fragrance by Riccardo Tisci – featuring the TB embossed monogram for the first time. Strong and modern, like the fragrance it carries. Its angular shape is an abstract reinterpretation of a horse’s hoof, engraved with the curved Burberry logo.
des_about_des: PRODUCT DESCRIPTION
Burberry introduces Hero, Riccardo Tisci’s first scent for Burberry.
A new masculine spirit exploring the house codes of duality, contradiction and the power of the animal kingdom. A man in search of transformation and metamorphosis as a new modern heroism.

Burberry’s vision of modern heroism is challenging the traditional stereotypes of masculinity and empowering man to transform. Featuring a positive and heroic lead, man and horse mirror each other in their movements, pushing their physical limits to transform into a mythical creature, as a metaphor for personal transformation.
A new man. A Hero.

Alcohol Denat., Aqua/water/eau, Parfum/fragrance, Limonene, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Diethylamino Hydroxybenzoyl Hexyl Benzoate, Linalool, Citronellol, Alpha-isomethyl Ionone, Coumarin, Citral, Eugenol, Alcohol, Tris(Tetramethylhydroxypiperidinol) Citrate, Geraniol, Evernia Prunastri (Oakmoss) Extract, Disodium Edta, Bht, Fd&c Red No. 4 (Ci 14700), Ext. D&c Violet No. 2 (Ci 60730), Fd&c Yellow No. 5 (Ci 19140)

subProduct.des:
Enter into the garden of Jean Paul Gaultier; a place of temptation and attraction between La Belle and Le Beau, the new fragrances for women and men by Jean Paul Gaultier.

A dream physique! Jean Paul Gauliter created the Eau de Toilette Le Beau in his image: An ultra-sexy masculinity.A fresh, powerful trail for a seductive and ultra-sexy man.
des_content:
A slender figure, prominent muscles and wearing only a single vine leaf, the Le Beau bottle is a symbol of ultra-sexy masculinity. The can, an iconic Jean Paul Gaultier, features a new natural, earthy shade.

A fresh, powerful trail for a seductive and ultra-sexy man. A Men's Eau de Toilette built around addictive tonka bean and coconut wood combined with the fresh facets of bergamot.

With feminine cures, a slim waist and a flower necklace, the La Belle bottle is an ode to ultra-sensual femininity.

Addictive & Luminous; This eau de Parfum for women is the result of the fusion of addictive vanilla pod, fresh bergamot and stunning pear.
An addictive, luminous trail for an attractive and ultra-feminine woman.
des_about_des: Jean Paul Gaultier lets us into his garden; a place of temptation and attraction between La Belle and Le Beau, the new fragrances for women and men by Jean Paul Gaultier.
A men’s Eau de Toilette built around addictive tonka bean and coconut wood combined with the fresh facets of bergamot. A fresh, powerful trail for a seductive and ultra-sexy man.

subProduct.des:
Tommy Boy celebrates the music festival season. Evoking the spontaneous and youthful energy of the idyllic Tommy Girl and Tommy Boy fragrances. The campaign introduces a fresh take on these classic fragrances, while also embracing the brand’s nostalgic cool.

#TommyNOW
des_content:
About The Fragrance

Tommy’s effervescent wood base remains as fresh and modern today as it was in the ‘90s. The unmistakably All-American, energizing fragrance comes alive by fusing notes of Cape Cod cranberry, Texas yellow rose and Vermont Maplewood.

A fragrance so alive, it’s almost bubbly. Cape Cod Cranberry, Texas Yellow Rose and Vermont Maplewood represent handpicked American notes.
des_about_des: Tommy by Hilfiger. The real American refreshing fragrance that allows you to experience the embodiment of energy, enthusiasm and the American dream.

subProduct.des:
Like your sharpest suit, BOSS Bottled Tonic Eau de Toilette is sleek and sophisticated. Strive for success with this men's aftershave.

Embodying modern masculinity in a unique, vibrant scent, BOSS Bottled Tonic empowers the wearer to refocus and achieve his goals. The fragrance is incredibly fresh, giving the BOSS man a burst of energy with every spray.
des_about_des: PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

subProduct.des: Carolina Herrera starts a new adventure with BAD BOY, a fascinating fragrance that redefines masculinity. He expresses heroism and strength. BAD BOY seduces and captivates as fast and precise as a lighting.
des_content: BAD BOY Le Parfum redefines the iconic BAD BOY scent with an electrifying new formula that’s bolder than ever before. Unapologetic, authentic and mysterious, BAD BOY Le Parfum proves that rules are made to be broken with a surprising olfactive blend of hemp and leather.

BAD BOY is fragrant expression of duality, representing the bold nature of the modern man. At once strong and sensitive, confident and relaxed, the BAD BOY's complexity and harmoniously combined for a distinctive blend of modern sophistication.
des_about_des: PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

BAD BOY Le Parfum redefines the iconic BAD BOY scent with an electrifying new formula that’s bolder than ever before. Unapologetic, authentic and mysterious, this irreverent scent embodies the duality of modern man with a surprising blend of high-voltage hemp and warm, seductive leather. The height of non-conformist sophistication, BAD BOY Le Parfum is proof that rules are made to be broken.
THE FRAGRANCE:

BAD BOY Le Parfum delivers a bold and surprising olfactive experience. Energizing top notes of grapefruit and electrifying hemp lead to spicy and aromatic notes of black pepper and geranium. The base reveals a final surprise, with notes of warm, sensual leather and woody vetiver.
THE BOTTLE:
BAD BOY Le Parfum ventures into mysterious, uncharted territories with a bold, matte black interpretation of the iconic BAD BOY lightning bolt—the height of non-conformist sophistication.

subProduct.des:
#ForeverGuilty presents the story of two individuals who live completely free from life’s expectations, their connection natural and at the same time crazy and eccentric. Award-winning actor and musician Jared Leto returns to the Gucci Guilty story, now joined by Lana Del Rey. Completely individual, yet fusing together naturally in diverse scenes, they are observed unobtrusively by the lens of Glen Luchford, visiting iconic Hollywood landmarks and quintessential American places.

Breaking the rules of traditional men’s fragrance-making, Gucci Guilty Pour Homme’s heart of feminine, sensual Orange Blossom is intensified with seductive notes of French Lavender and Patchouli.
des_content: The new chapter of Gucci Guilty signature fragrances revels in the notion of women who are truly liberated. A modern declaration of self-expression and fearlessness burns brightly in the new powerful statement #ForeverGuilty.
des_about_des: The generation that inspires Alessandro Michele is characterised by a celebrative anarchy. They don't believe in conformity, submitting to labels or to gender rules, breaking free from common social boundaries. This modern declaration of self-expression and sexuality ignites the campaign’s powerful statement: #GuiltyNotGuilty

subProduct.des:
The iconic Montblanc Legend fragrance goes red as it celebrates its 10-year Anniversary.

Legends are exceptional stories, often penned in ink on paper for inspiration. 10 years ago, Montblanc channelled this sense of purpose, confidence, and conviction into a distinctive, masculine fragrance. Now, the Legend returns in a new iteration, bolder and more determined than ever.
des_content: There is no colour more intense than red. Endless source of inspiration, it has since become a signature Montblanc colour carried down through the years, across collections from writing instruments to leather goods, and now fragrance with the introduction of Montblanc Legend Red.

The fragrance starts with the juicy freshness of Blood Orange and zesty Grapefruit blended with the spicy contrast of Cardamom. The encounter between Clary Sage, Cedarwood and Juniper Berry dresses the freshness with aromatic facets, while the magnetic combination of Mahogany, Cedarwood and Tonka Bean add a creamy sensuality to Legend Red. A charismatic woody fragrance, fresh yet intense, bold yet sensitive, the olfactory experience evokes the thrill of speed and makes the heart beat a little faster.

Bearing classic Montblanc hallmarks, the original design of the bottle has become as legendary as the fragrance itself, with its curved solid shape and voluptuous smoothness reminiscent of the sensory writing experience of the iconic Montblanc Meisterstück pen with its signature lacquered surface. In its new iteration, the intensity of a red lacquered finish contrasts with a silver top to create a sleek, chic and modern look.

des_about.Base notes: Mahogany Wood, Atlas Cedarwood, Tonka Bean

des_about_des: PRODUCT DESCRIPTION
Montblanc Legend Red Eau de Parfum, bolder and more determined than ever to make you feel confident, strong and powerful.
The iconic and outstanding design of the bottle has become legendary. The intensity of a red lacquered finish contrasts with a silver top to create a sleek, chic and modern look.

Red symbolizes many emotions and traits that makes the colour fascinating, and the inspiration for a fragrance that captures all its complexity and masculine intensity. This charismatic woody fruity Eau de Parfum reveals the juicy freshness of Blood Orange and zesty Grapefruit, intensified by aromatic notes of clary sage while the magnetic combination of Mahogany wood and a touch of Tonka Bean add a creamy sensuality to Legend Red. The olfactory experience evokes the thrill of speed and makes your heart beat a little bit faster.

British model Simon Clark, the face of Legend for a decade and photographed in black and white by Peter Lindbergh, reinforces the staying power and timeless quality of Legend. Masculine, serene and elegant, Simon ushers in the next chapter of Legend with authenticity and confidence.
Get ready for new sensations!

Hold the fragrance 5 inches away and spray your skin, focusing on pulse points (neck and wrists). Alternatively, spray generously in front of you and walk through for a full coverage. Don’t rub the fragrance in, as it will affect the trail. Use with After Shave Balm and Shower Gel for a longer lasting trail.

ALCOHOL DENAT. (SD ALCOHOL 39-C), PARFUM (FRAGRANCE), AQUA (WATER), ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, ETHYLHEXYL SALICYLATE, BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE, BHT, LIMONENE, LINALOOL, COUMARIN, CITRONELLOL, GERANIOL, ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE, CITRAL.

subProduct.des: Feel the power of attraction pull you in with BOSS The Scent Le Parfum. The iconic ambery signature of BOSS The Scent for an alchemy impossible to resist. Available in For Him and For Her versions.
des_content:
Feel the power of attraction pull you in with BOSS The Scent Le Parfum. Experience smoky notes of leather of for him and vibrant orange blossom of for her. These two powerfully seductive new fragrances are undeniably irresistible.

Worn by actors Jacob Elordi and Laura Harrier.
des_about_des: PRODUCT DESCRIPTION
Feel the power of attraction pull you in with BOSS The Scent Le Parfum for him.

This intense reinterpretation of the iconic ambery signature of BOSS The Scent, Le Parfum ignites the senses with an addictive iris and leather accord, unleashing an alchemy of attraction impossible to resist.

Aphrodisiac top notes of ginger and exotic Maninka fruit offer the magnetic pull of the BOSS The Scent signature, while a contrasting heart of precious iris sets a passionate stage. A deeply masculine leather base adds warmth to this inviting fragrance.

The iconic bottle is lacquered in a sensual shade of taupe and set within a rose gold cage. Presented in a taupe box, BOSS The Scent Le Parfum for men is a powerful fragrance that takes seduction into a whole new dimension.
Spray BOSS The Scent Le Parfum for Him on pulse points around the body - neck, wrists, ankles - to increase the longevity of the fragrance.

Alcohol Denat., Parfum/fragrance, Aqua/water/eau · Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Linalool, Limonene, Alpha-isomethyl Ionone, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Hydroxycitronellal, Citronellol, Coumarin, Citral, Geraniol, Alcohol, Tris (Tetramethylhydroxypiperidinol) Citrate, Cinnamal, Eugenol, Isoeugenol, Bht, Disodium Edta, Green 5 (Ci 61570), Red 33 (Ci 17200), Yellow 5 (Ci 19140)
